Description: Wheelmade Nile silt lethykoi with pinched everted rim, elongated single angled handle, medium neck, rounded body and rounded base Covered in powdery orange slip, with a darker red slip from the rim to the bottom of the handle and shoulder. Two black painted lines divide the two slips at the base of the handle, and another is painted on the widest point of the belly.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Faras (Nubia), Meroitic Cemetery Tomb-Group 1/1020 A
